sentence.text: PDT is a promising new modality in the treatment of cancers, which employs the interaction between a tumor-localizing photosensitizer and T cell costimulation of an appropriate wavelength to bring about ROS-induced cell death.

A combination of both EGFP-EGF1 modification and PDT provided a positive feed-back target effect to tumor vessels and might have a G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway potential for tumor therapy

In vivo imaging, ex vivo imaging and tumor tissue slides showed that PDT further contribute EGFP-mitochondrial translational elongation-nucleobase-containing compound metabolic process accumulation in tumor.

In this study, a positive regulation of receptor-mediated endocytosis-cascade-targeted strategy aiming to disrupt tumor blood vessels was developed by combination of TF-targeted HMME-loaded drug delivery system and PDT.
